==== Ubuntu Women ====
* Team Meeting <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20120110|January 10th]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-57/|Full Circle Magazine, Issue #57]]</nowiki> with interview of Gema Gomez-Solano from the Ubuntu QA team
* Small meetup at SCALE10x (<nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2012-January/003440.html|photo]]</nowiki>)
* Updated <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/UDS|UDS]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/UDS/Stories|UDS Stories]]</nowiki> pages for launch of <nowiki>[[http://www.jonobacon.org/2012/01/27/ubuntu-developer-summit-sponsorship-now-open-3/|UDS sponsorship]]</nowiki>
